data.desc: Mastermind is a color-finding single-player game in which the player has ten steps to guess which colors are hidden in what order. Gameplay: There are four hidden colors at the beginning of the game, you have to guess in ten steps, with 8 color buttons. After each guess, the pins show how successful the colors and their order were. The number of hits that are in it and in the right place are indicated in black color. And with a white color, that are in it, but not in the right place. You can submit your tip with Submit button or you can change it with Back button.

2048 is played on a 4*4 grid, with numbered tiles that slide when a player moves them using W(up), S(down), A(left), D(right) keys. Every turn, a new tile will randomly appear in an empty spot on the board with a value of either 2 or 4. If two tiles of the same number collide while moving, they will merge into a tile with the total value of the two tiles that collided. The game is won when a tile with a value of 2048 appears on the board, hence the name of the game. When the player has no legal moves the game ends.

Tic-tac-toe, noughts and crosses, or Xs and Os, is a paper-and-pencil game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3Ã—3 grid.The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row is the winner. In this game it is possible to play against an AI or a chosen opponent of yours.

This game is about a snake which has a liking in apples. Your goal is to feed the snake with as many apple as possible. Everytime your snake eats an apple its stomach gets bigger and bigger. Be careful because a long snake is harder to control than a smaller snake. You must avoid the snake to crash into its own body because then your snake gets tangled, consequently you can not continue to eat apples and the game is over. You should avoid crashing into the walls as well because then your snake is hurt and your game is over. A snake with a big belly is happier than a snake with a small belly. Try to be the one who gets its snake the longest and happiest.
